modName: Porcelain Pale Vampire Skin For Females and Males -Most Body Types Supported-
summary: A pale flawless skin for vampires(Female and Male). Can be used a full skin replacer for all or used as a vampire only skin mod.
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://i44.tinypic.com/21o3tig.jpg[/img]
Porcelain/Vampire skin for For CBBE, CBBE Skinny, CHSBHC, ADEC, UNP, UNPB, UNP Skinny, SeveNBase And DreamGirl Body.

[img]http://i39.tinypic.com/116ltop.jpg[/img]
This mod is an edit upon several other mods, as well as my own creation and ideas. When I created my vampire I thought that she wasn't pale enough and so I began crafting a new skin tone out of the SG Texture Renewal. (On multiple requests I converted Better Females by BellaGail to work with this mod (All Credits go to them for their wonderful mod)You will find these under the optional files and are for manual installation only.)

While I was changing the skin tone, I thought to myself about adding vampire bites on the neck as this seemed to add more authenticity to the vampire character and so I set out to do just that by creating my own unique texture sets for bite marks. I also thought that the Sporty Sexy map that I was using had a far too strong muscle tone which I edited the map to make it seem less muscular, but still lightly toned. The overall look I wanted to achieve was for a flawless pale, authentic and beautiful vampire skin.

This is not a straight copy of the mods listed in the credits, I did a lot of tweaking to make this as good as I can and I sincerely thank those whose mods I have edited.

I am currently not sure how well this will work with all body types, but for a list of the supported types, please see my features section on this page.

If you download this mod I would very much like it if you could upload screenshots of you characters, thank you. All of the files within this mod used with the correct body and vanilla head mesh should make the texture look practically seamless.
[img]http://i42.tinypic.com/qs1o5e.jpg[/img]
This mod is compatable with the following optional Mods:
Dynamic Vampire Appearance
Better Vampires
Better vampire eyes and teeth

This mod is compatable with Vanilla, UNP, CBBE, SeveNBase, CHSBHC, ADEC, UNPB, UNP Skinny, DreamGirl Body, CBBE Slim, Vanilla males and Better Males.

Female Body types:
CBBE:
CBBE Slim, CBBE and CHSBHC.

UNP:
Vanilla, UNP, SeveNBase, UNPB, UNP Skinny and DreamGirl Body.

ADEC

Male Body types:
Porcelain skin for males:
Vanilla males and Better Males.


The mod allows users to experience a more authentic vampire look within Skyrim. Allowing players to choose between a selection of body types, skins and hair configurations.




[img]http://i44.tinypic.com/2jdgnb6.jpg[/img]

If you want to install my mod manually then download it with the Nexus Mod Manager, extract the mod to a temporary location. Then, through the clearly labelled folders, select which options you would like to install and copy the textures (the .dds files) to your Skyrim directory (the exact locations are listed below).

For Any and ALL Installations of this mod, you must install the files under the UNIVERSAL directory.
For Universal... install to: SkyrimDataTexturesActorsCharacterFemale
For UniversalCharacter Assetstintmasks... install to: SkyrimDataTexturesActorsCharactercharacter assetstintmasks

For CBBE and UNP Manual Texture Installations, under the corresponding folder (for UNP choose UNP, for CBBE choose CBBE) and copy the files from and to:

COPY From COPY TO
Body Options: SkyrimDataTexturesActorsCharacterFemale
Muscle Options: SkyrimDataTexturesActorsCharacterFemale
Pubic Hair Options: SkyrimDataTexturesActorsCharacterFemale
Sweat Options: SkyrimDataTexturesActorsCharacterFemale

If you wish to utilise the Vampire Texture Framework then copy the VTF-Dawnguard.esp file from the installation folder of this mod, directly to your skyrim's install directories' data folder and change the location you copy your files to, so they now look like so:

COPY From COPY TO
Body Options: SkyrimDataTexturesVTF
Muscle Options: SkyrimDataTexturesVTF
Pubic Hair Options: SkyrimDataTexturesVTF
Sweat Options: SkyrimDataTexturesVTF
*******************************

Recommended Mods



Dynamic Vampire Appearance
Better Vampires
Better vampire eyes and teeth


Mods using my skin:
TPFollowers by techprince = http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/55942/?
Venette by techprince = http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59466/?
Victoria Velina The Dark Mage by choco2114 = http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/48714/?
Fyre Brimstone - Standalone Follower by lewbob = http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/56419/?
Zoe - Wood Elf Standalone Follower by lewbob = http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/57145/? 
Serana Reborn by Alistair77 = http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59233/?
EVE by phoenixmass = http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59650/?
[img]http://i40.tinypic.com/104iw04.jpg[/img]
Thank you to all these people and of course to Bethesda!
*******************************
Credits:Check out all these wonderful authors and their mods!
Caliente's hi-res skin textures by Caliente
Dimonized UNP Body hi-res skin by Dimon99
SG texture renewal by HelloSanta
Sporty sexy normal map by Xs2reality
Sporty sweaty specular map by Xs2reality
Vampire Texture Framework by SableDrak
eBetter Females by BellaGail
Better Males by Chris57 and FavoredSoul For the base body and face textures.
High Res Face Maps For Men by Geonox

User pages for all the credited modders:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/3330686/?
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/537675/?
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/2209393/?
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/3329763/?

author: MissShazira

files.name: Porcelain Skin CBBE Basic -Also use for CHSBHC bodies-
files.changelogHtml:
Support for males added (Vanilla males and Better Males only)
-Basic skin replacer for all males
-VTF male textures are now included with all the basic female VTF packages
I fixed the VTF males before release, else there would of been dark face bugs for male NPC's
